«?. H. LaGUARDIA, Mayor
M. S. NOVIK, Director
CITY OF NEW YORK
MUNICIPAL BROADCASTING SYSTEM
MUNICIPAL BUILDING
WORTH 2-5600
WNYC
And
Stations
WASJ
WKDX
WBCD
W2XRG
W2XVP
May 18th, 1939
Mr. Prank E. Schooley
The National Association of Educational Broadcasters
University of Illinois
Urbana, Ill.
My dear Mr. Schooley;
I have enclosed herewith my check for
$10.00 for association in the NAEB. I’m sorry that
this hasn’t been sent on to you before, hut the World’s
Pair and the additional work it has brought in its wake
since we have additional studios on the grounds, caused
my forgetfulness.
Very sincerely yours.
Director
MSNjc
"New York City’s Own Station”—810 Kc.
